hero.title: The essence of everything
hero.subtitle: Indulge in a gastronomic journey where every dish is a culinary masterpiece, crafted with ultra precision.

about.title: Experience Italy like never before.
about.description: Tutto, meaning "everything" in Italian, embodies our restaurant's philosophy of delivering a complete, authentic Italian experience. More than just a name, Tutto represents our commitment to bringing you everything that makes Italian cuisine extraordinary.
